users app¶

Submodules¶

users.views¶

users.views.login_view(request)[source]¶

View function for the login page. Allows users to log in to their account.

users.views.logout_view(request)[source]¶

View function to log out the user.

users.views.signup(request)[source]¶

View function for the signup page. Allows users to register using a sign up form.
